main event: A woman observed an unidentified silver object near her home in British Columbia, Canada on 9 August 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as saucer-shaped and was silver in color., It was observed for about 20 to 30 seconds with no change in speed or altitude., The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 8,000 to 10,000 feet., The object appeared to be about a quarter of the size of the moon., This was the only time the witness reported seeing such an object.
